website_summaries.verdict: 3-layer construction creates a very comfortable interior, while faux suede keeps the slipper water-resistant for outdoor use. Good choice for those who want to upgrade from inexpensive Deerfoam-type indoor-only slippers.
pros: Soles are soft, better for those with foot issues
Primarily an indoor slipper, but can be worn outside as well
cons: Sizing is extremely variable, and the material can stretch over time

customer_reviews.title: For the comfort conscious nocturnal ninja...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy. Soft. Warm. Fuzzy. A bit small but they'll stretch out after a few dozen midnight refrigerator raids. Soft soles are stealthy quiet thereby enhancing my ninja powers. That helps prevent others from hearing my nocturnal noshing operations. Just don't drop the steel pan lid like I did. I recommend a thorough coating of Scotch Guard because as they are, these do not repel barbecue sauce.
customer_reviews.author: G. ConnerTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Follow the size chart
customer_reviews.text: These are Extra Large and I had to return them because they were too big for my size 11 feet. It is NOT size 12-13. The sizes are as follow: Small = 7-8, Med = 9-10, Large = 11-12, XL = 13-14. I got the large and they fit just right. Because they are low in the back you don't want these too loose. The photo will show the actual size tag that came with the slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Crother

customer_reviews.title: Feet pain and these slippers miracle
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not buy slippers but because of cancer treatment my ankles hold water and it feels like stepping on glass to walk. I bought these hoping because these had potential to cushion my feet I purchased them. They are great! The water in my feet that causes pain drops by 70%!!! Recommend if your feet hurt or you need warm feet.
customer_reviews.author: Onifer76

customer_reviews.title: needs more padding.
customer_reviews.text: pretty good indoor slippers. I wish the padding was a tad bit more substantial at the soles but overall comfortable fit Update: Had it for a bit. I don't know if I got a defective one but the padding is non existent. I see all these reviews talking about thick padding but I never thought it was very thick. In fact I can feel the ground as I walk and there is no cushion whatsoever. I was expecting something more like memory foam feel. Basically walking around with socks on.
customer_reviews.author: Pink Muffin

customer_reviews.title: Husband's favorite house shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased these for my wonderful hubby...he has been hinting at wanting new slippers forever. My procrastination kept me from looking until a couple weeks ago. I found these and I purchased them based off of the rating and reviews. I was concerned that buying shoes online was not a good plan, but I sucked it up anyways. Thank goodness these came with the expected fit and they feel awesome! I sneak my feet in them sometimes, but my husband is obsessed! Every day he comes home and switches shoes right away. I would totally buy these for the slipperless person in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. I’ve only had them for a couple of days but they’re exactly what I was wanting. I love the support for our tile floors. As for fit I usually wear a 9 to 9 1/2 in US and the 9 to 10 size works great. If you wear a 10 I would recommend the bigger size especially if you plan on wearing socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mason W

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Vonmay suggests you choose a size larger than your foot size for this slipper. My recommendation is to buy your actual shoe size. I'm in the process of having to return the initial pair I purchased and buying a smaller size because they're boats on my feet (i'm a size 10.5 and ordered 11-12 and they do not fit at all, waaaaay too big). My advice, buy the next size DOWN, not up. Otherwise, a decent slipper, comfortable and warm. Appreciate that here in Seattle. Vonmay was also quick to send a new order I placed for the correct size.
customer_reviews.author: MOS Fan

customer_reviews.title: Bought a 2nd pair after loving the first
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift for my son-in-law who didn't own a pair of slippers. He didn't think he would like them, but appreciated the gift nonetheless. HE LOVED THEM!!!! He wore them everyday as soon as he would get home from work and ANY time he was home. He and my daughter were both surprised at how much he loved them. They were amazingly comfortable. I waited six months and purchased him a new pair. He was so happy to receive a fresh pair! LOL! I plan to continue to replace them due to wear and tear, and if he's wearing them all the time, I'll replace every six months. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Medinarv

customer_reviews.title: Would not order again
customer_reviews.text: The slippers were shipped in a bag, so by the time they arrived they were all smashed (I'm guess from being on top of other items in the trucks). I ordered a size 9 and they fit like10/10-1/2. They are super big length and with size. I threw them away after one week. Returns are too much of a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Doherty

customer_reviews.title: 😞 waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Were soft and comfortable BUT the sole was very poorly made wore in house only wore completely through, foot touches floor, in less than 3 months. Total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Onna Lexseeia

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Year
customer_reviews.text: I bought these roughly a year ago and have been very happy. They are comfortable, of solid construction, and appear to be made of decent material. The memory foam was nice for a while but eventually faded away and now it is basically like walking on the floor unprotected in terms of comfort. For the first year or so they were great and I am struggling to find a decent pair to replace them, so for $20, I decided to just buy another pair of these because I was happy the first time until the foam deteriorated. Good product but won't last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and received a defective pair. I wrote an email directly to the Vonmay customer service team and they responded right away to resolve the issue. I received a new pair of slippers about a week later and they're great. As for the slippers, they're a bit snug when you first put them on, but the memory foam will eventually give way and create a bit of room in the slippers as you wear them. Very comfortable for around the house, and for picking up the mail from the box outside.
customer_reviews.author: John C.

customer_reviews.title: Wide
customer_reviews.text: Update: it's been less than a month and the stitching inside is tearing, the outside is fraying, and the 'cushion' on the heel is flattened out with a permanent indentation. Very disappointed. Original: I can only give 3 for the quality of these slippers. They feel nice on the feet but are very wide all around... Too wide and hard to keep on while walking. Also, it does not offer enough cushioning while standing. I had expected more after reading the description and some reviews. These would be good for someone planning on keeping their feet up and not walking too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers in the world.
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are unexplainable so much so that I'm gonna end this review here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT SLIPPERS!
customer_reviews.text: Stupid me! I bought a pair of these at the same time I bought the black NDB Men's Warm Memory Foam Suede Plus XXX slipons. Like those, this slipper has very little heel height, so they slip off my heels as though they were meant to be flip flops. Both pair will go to St. Vinny's as they are of no use to me. Someone will like them.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence C.

customer_reviews.title: Size not the same as US sizes
customer_reviews.text: The shoe runs much smaller than a true US sizes. The appearance of the shoe is good but even if you decided to return them in or outside the country is a process in itself with the mail these days. If it is shipped within the United States the shipment process is horrible. The waiting period with the chance of lengthy time and something being wrong with the order, let's just say I wouldn't do it again. I have a large feet there is not a replacement size for me.
customer_reviews.author: RDF

customer_reviews.title: Basic
customer_reviews.text: These are disposable one season slippers. The soles are hard, a bit slippery, noisy and crack after a few months, so even stepping on a damp porch will get you wet feet. The insoles are cheap foam that flatten quickly into a thin pad, that's not particularly warm. The upper part is fine, the sewing's held up, the material isn't particularly warm. Why three stars? They're cheap, and would probably serve someone who lived in a warmer climate, who doesn't wear them all that often well. They're not horrible, but inadequate for my cold floors.
customer_reviews.author: G. McKay

customer_reviews.title: Usually buy based on reviews but these suck.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry. I don't usually leave reviews, but if you are a dude, these skippers suck. It's seriously like walking on the floor. Virtually no padding (def not mem foam). Go for a higher quality cuz these seriously are disappointing. But too cheap to waste time returning which sucks even more. Going back to my overpriced Sorel indoor / outdoor booties.
customer_reviews.author: Coop B.

customer_reviews.title: I shall continue my quest for indoor/outdoor slippers, hopefully ones that won't try to bring me death by tripping.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Comfortable. Soft. The fit felt good. Nice soles. Did I mention comfortable? Cons: The right one kept falling off, even though it seemed to fit as well as the left. The packaging they came in was a shipping envelope, they were all smooshed together when I took them out, perhaps this is the reason the right one kept falling off. I'm returning them, and shall continue my quest for indoor/outdoor slippers, hopefully ones that won't try to bring me death by tripping.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Welsh

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of these slippers for my boyfriend last year for Christmas since then I've bought him two more pairs as well. He wears them everywhere. He has an outside pair that he wears when he's not working but has to run errands, and an indoor pair when he's home. I've tried to convince him to put on sneakers when going out, but after working seventy hours a week, he tells me they're the most comfortable thing he wears on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jay88

customer_reviews.title: Splitting at the seams after a year.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year as an around the house shoe. I worked from home before it was cool, so these got a lot of work. However, I didn't expect the rubber soles to start splitting after less than a year. I'm a big guy, but I just walked around our house. Maybe 2 times I wore them out on the driveway. There's no call for the kind of damage you see in the attached picture. The slippers are just falling apart. Would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Butler

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought 12 and they fit, however, I do have to run my finger around the heel to get my size 12's securely inside. They run a tiny bit smaller than I am used to in slippers. That minor annoyance aside, and it is very minor, these are great. The sole in particular is superior to others I have owned, being used a lot outside and not getting wet while providing very good traction and stability. They are very warm indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie D

customer_reviews.title: Great slipper but they changed the sizing format so won't fit everyone!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these exact same slippers a year ago and loved them. I wear an 12 shoe and like my slippers to be a half size bigger so back then I ordered the 12/13 size and it fit perfectly. Unfortunately this company has changed their sizing chart and now you can only get them in 11/12 or 13/14. I had to choose the 13/14 because the other would have been too small. This size (as expected) is about a size too big. I like the feel of these clogs and am currently a repeat customer but if they don't redo their size options again by the time I need a new pair, I will have to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers I ever owned... for about a week
customer_reviews.text: These were fluffy and comfortable and fit well for about a week, by which point the insides had been completely flattened from use, and never recovered. Now it's like walking directly on the rubber soles, which is actually less comfortable than being barefoot. Additionally, what was previously a comfortable, if somewhat loose, fit, became FAR too large once this had happened, meaning they threaten to fall off my feet when I'm wearing them now.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Sova

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is a comfortable slipper...not rugged by any means...but I was just looking for comfort to onlyl wear around the house...I wear a woman's 10 W, and I was looking to wear thick plush socks with these slippers...I read they ran different in sizes...so I ordered the men"s 11-12, it was perfect...so between the thick socks and the like butter slippers...my feet are happy...lol
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA  SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great house shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are extremely comfortable. I love the way they feel without socks, with socks it's a more secure fit; not tight, but secure. They do run a tad small so I recommend getting at least a full size up( if you wear a 10 get an 11, 10.5 get a 11.5 or 12) ect
customer_reviews.author: Mr Jones & Mrs Jones

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up but very warm and comfy and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered before and showed up to small. So I was contacted by the seller and they set another pair a size up and kept me up to date on shipping and every step of this matter. They sent them free of charge and I didn't have to send back the other pair. Great customer service and are wanting their customers happy! Thank you for helping. They are comfy and warm and worth the price. Just order a size up is my only problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lease

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE THESE!! I was looking for the perfect house slipper, and I decided on these. I definitely made the right choice. These fit perfectly, and are so comfortable I almost forget I'm wearing them a LOT of the time...Several times I've caught myself in the car going to store, only to realize I'm still wearing my slippers..and YET still not wanting to take them off..I actually braved 7-11 one morning in them, just because I didn't want to wear anything else..Yes, they ARE that comfortable....You WILL find yourself willing to give up your social dignity in public, just to keep wearing these...You've been warned..lol
customer_reviews.author: Alfonso Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers, comfortable enough to wear all day around the house. Sole of the slipper is tough enough to go outside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Slipper came apart and vendor didn't respond.
customer_reviews.text: My slippers are only 4 months old, and I only wear then before and after bedtime, so they have very little wear. The seam behind the heal opened up and the whole insides is coming out, making the slipper worthless. I replied to the email the vendor originally sent out, but I have had no reply. Poor construction and poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: p bruce booher

customer_reviews.title: It's ok but, not great.
customer_reviews.text: These felt a little too small. The white trim is beautiful and stylish. The two tone color made the imperfections in the construction stand out.The light brown line just looked 'off' going around the slipper. The big thing for me was the memory foam. The manufacturers just need to do away with memory foam. You step into a slipper and your feet just sink straight to the floor, crushing the foam. Overtime, it's just going to lose it's memory and stay flat.The white trim was bright. It'll only show the dirt more over time and it didn't feel 'substantial'... more lightweight. Truth be told... if it wasn't two-tone I'd probably have kept them and not returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Stroke4

customer_reviews.title: Good fit.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift. They fit well and keep the feet toasty. One reason they didn't get a 5th star? The 'stitching' on the side has come out. It is decorative so I clipped it off where it was coming apart. But it doesn't look good once the stitch comes apart until you clip it off. Otherwise these are great, just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Cher'i'O

customer_reviews.title: I'm in between sizes, so they're a bit loose for me
customer_reviews.text: These are decent house shoes, but the lining is very fluffy and fuzzy, and it only take a half hour or so for my feet to start sweating in them. They work a lot better with thin socks. I got the 9-10 size, and I wear 8 1/2 shoes. So they're a bit loose. I can't run or even walk quickly without them threatening to slip off. Despite the product description, these are too loose for me to go any further outside than the porch. You might do better if your shoe size is a bit smaller than mine, so you could use the 7-8, or a bit larger than mine.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair of these in brown about 4 years ago. They were the most comfortable slippers I have ever bought all the way up to me throwing them away. The soles started to finally crack and material falling apart. I bought my second pair as soon as I threw the first pair away. They came quickly and were exactly what I wanted. They are very comfortable and they are durable enough to wear outside. 10/10 I would buy these again or as a present for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: A little small at first but loosened within a few days
customer_reviews.text: These seemed a little small at first but within a few days they fit just fine. i actually like them quite a bit, they are decently warm and seem like th e sole will last at least a whole fall winter spring season.
customer_reviews.author: Hope Hudson

customer_reviews.title: They will stretch
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has diabetes and he likes them. They seem small but after reading instructions for stretching them they are better. He really likes how soft the insoles are. I will definitely but more of these but probably a bigger size. They are well made and were delivered promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen N.

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Toasty!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! The fit was perfect and they are so warm and comfortable to wear. The price is great, too. Couldn't touch slippers of this quality and this price at the mall! I was surprised how quickly my order arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Rios

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Slipper
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to find a comfortable slipper, This one has held up well so far, shows no signs of coming apart which has been a problem with my last few pair, not this brand. They feel really comfortable I usually wear dark socks with them and the dye from the socks are starting to make the inside look dirty as it's light. Overall, I will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for what they are
customer_reviews.text: When I first got these, I was like, "oh my God they're comfortable." Initially it felt like I was walking on an inch of cushion and the inside liner was nice and fluffy. After a couple weeks, the padding was matted down, and the inside was no longer fluffy. I washed them with warm water on the delicate cycle, and air dried them on my balcony recently. Didn't really do much to bring them back to how they were when I first got them. They're decent enough. Nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Nick S

customer_reviews.title: A cut about the average slipper
customer_reviews.text: If your're a heavy tub like me, you're gonna smash every plush slipper you buy eventually - sooner than later. Having said that, these slippers are definitely a cut above the three-month throwaways you can but at Wal-Mart. They have retained their comfort and the heel and top have not collapsed. However, the cushion in the sole is pretty much squashed flat but other than that I am pleased with their warmth, durability and comfort. The non-slip surface is very good and I can wear them to go outside and get the mail and still be warm.
customer_reviews.author: Cigarman

customer_reviews.title: Boyfriend loved these in the beginning
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend loved these in the beginning, as they were very comfortable and cushy. He also loves the fact that they're slides. Unfortunately, they very quickly lost the foam cushion. He wears a size 13, so I purchased XL 13-14. Unfortunately the XL pair are way too small for him. I wouldn't purchase again unless they came in 2xl and had a cushioned sole that lasted a bit longer. He loves them and still wears them despite the fact there is no more cushion and his heel is sticking out of the back. lol! He's great for not complaining, but I know better. Sigh, my search continues...
customer_reviews.author: Tracyann

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty frustrating as one heel feels like its steeping on ...
customer_reviews.text: One's bigger than the other. Its pretty frustrating as one heel feels like its stepping on the back part of the slipper while the other one's nice and comfy. It sweats pretty bad too. Update: Now that all the interior material has compacted, my foot fits pretty comfortably although its now no longer comfy. I'm walking on cardboard and rubber. I'd never ever buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Gii

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Slipper but loose for Stair Climbing
customer_reviews.text: Very very comfy....feels like your stepping on air when you first put them on. Only reason for dropping a star is the rear lip could be just a little higher for my foot. Finding a slipper that is a slip on(step into) slipper that gives you enough grab on the back to do stairs is tough. This is not one of them....careful on the stairs....they want to fall off...but other than that...great comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn S

customer_reviews.title: Run Small ***UPDATE***
customer_reviews.text: As many have stated, these slippers run small. I wear a 10.5 in shoes and the 11-12 fit just right. Warm and comfortable. I thought I might not like the low heel but have had no problems. They stay on my feet when walking without any flip flop. Hoping these will not pill up on the fleece. Rubber sole is thin and flexible, not rigid. Wouldn't recommend for outdoors.***UPDATE***These slippers pill up and look terrible after regular use.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Comfortable, Nice to Wear for Inside Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Pricing: Excellent price point Quality: Very fuzzy and warm, squishy inside and hard rubber bottoms Construction/Materials: Good materials, washes easily with no tearing or fading Likeness to Photo: Exactly as pictured Pros: Love these for the price, very soft and comfortable Cons: Lower end materials. Similar to what you would buy at drugstore rather than shoe store Notes: Very nice for wearing around the house, if you intend to go outside a lot you may want to upgrade to a sturdier model.
customer_reviews.author: Erin L. Prieskorn

customer_reviews.title: Nice Slippers, But Husband Feels They Look Like Ladies
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for my husband for Christmas. I liked them much more than he did. He felt they looked feminine (I didn't see that at all, but I'm not the one wearing them). I think they're nice, quality slippers. They may have to grow on my husband, however.
customer_reviews.author: J. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Order a size larger - they don't last long
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, would prefer if the soles were a bit more hardy. Definitely for inside the house. I like the looks too. They fit somewhat small, I would normally wear and 8 but ordered the 9-10 and they fit snugly lengthwise. 4/13/17: Update. I would've expected that these slippers would wear for longer than a few months. After just a short period of time they look and feel like they're years old. The felt is balled up and the insides are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Boxiebabe

customer_reviews.title: My feet are finally warm
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers - could not be happier. I could wear these anywhere. Update (on most recent purchase of these): I think this is my 3rd time buying. I checked my old pairs and they were all medium. The pair I just got is much smaller than usual across the top. I couldn’t get the front of my foot in without stretching them. As a repeat customer, I’ve never had an issue and have stretched these out to fit barely, but it may be worth it to go up a size. Not sure if this is a fluke, but definitely going with large next time.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tait

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm for winter!
customer_reviews.text: They are soft, comfy and warm, not sure about the wear and tear yet it is too early to tell. The color is just what I wanted. It seems like good quality I would have to revisit the review and give an update in a few months to see how they are holding on to everyday tear and wear.
customer_reviews.author: Vanesen

customer_reviews.title: Small fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 10 in pretty much every show manufacturer. Because of this I ordered the 9-10 size and I can barely get my feet all the way in. My heal won't stay inside the little heal lip. If the size is 9-10 I would hope they fit a guy with a 10 foot.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy shoes and durable
customer_reviews.text: My hubby ordered a pair loved them so I ordered me a pair. Perfect & very comfortable. They’re fluffy on the inside so I recommend ordering one size up. I usually wear a size 8 in men’s so I ordered the medium 9/10 and they’re perfect. My feet fit in them perfectly and comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my toes warm!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't purchased slippers in like forever and this turned out to be a great choice. They look good, they feel good, the memory foam works and best of all, my feet and especially my toes are warm. I'm very pleased and recommend these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: RLJComm

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable, but maybe too warm for some.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 14 year old son. Hes had them for just over a week and he loves them. Memory foam seems to be holding up and not smashing flat yet. He has size 10 foot and they were just a little big. Hes pretty rough on shoes and they are not showing any signs of breaking. His only complaint is they make his feet sweat.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Nice but runs large
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are of good quality. I would have given them a higher rating if it were not for them being too large. I have a short foot 7.5 to 8 mens. I was pleased to see them offer a small size, however what i received was at least an 8.5 or maybe even a 9.
customer_reviews.author: rod

customer_reviews.title: Quality control issues
customer_reviews.text: I understand that the memory foam will eventually flatten out, but I'm always a size 11 and this 11/12 is way too tight. And on top of that, the actual fit of each foot is different. The left definitely has more room than the right. Quality control issue.
customer_reviews.author: CapCityAT

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not quite long enough
customer_reviews.text: My husband usually wears a 12 but these stop at the back of his foot under his heel. Don't get me wrong... They're very comfy and they match a robe I bought him with similar material. He loves them. I just wish he wasn't walking on the back of them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Pair of House Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, warm and just what I needed in a pair of house slippers. I like that the sole of the slipper is made so that you can step outside if needed. I wear a size 9.5/10 and I ordered my regular size. I debated other comments left on here as well as the website's suggestion to order a size up but I found these to fit perfectly in my regular size. Highly recommend. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sancal

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable - go 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: The slippers are very comfortable. They're a fair bit larger overall than I expected while simultaneously fitting a little bit smaller than I expected. I typically wear size 10.5 and I purchased the size 11-12 slippers and they fit just about right. I'd definitely recommend buying a size larger than what you normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have back issues and am diabetic. We don’t wear shoes in our house. These are extremely comfortable. Because of my diabetes, my feet are always cold. But not when I wear these! They have great cushion, and help keep my back from hurting when I have to stand, like when cooking dinner. I love them!
customer_reviews.author: HuntandFishVATop Contributor: Beekeeping

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says. Nice, comfortable and warm. Usually a size 11, ordered size 11-12 and it fits just right. A lot of foam on the sole, which makes them very comfortable but might be a problem for people with sensitive tendons.
customer_reviews.author: Erock

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected when ordering size up
customer_reviews.text: FITS AS EXPECTED DISCLAIMER- If you read where it says to order a size up, then it fits perfectly. I wear a size 12 so I ordered a 13-14 and I couldn't be happier. The product- these are the bomb buy them now. Order a size up like it says and then cry with happiness when your feet feel memory foam bliss at a stupid affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: you'll be happy you did
customer_reviews.text: Follow the advice of buying one larger size, you'll be happy you did. I'm really happy with these slippers, they're very soft on the inside and in the sole, plus they allow for comfortable toe-wiggle room, which is to say they don't constrict your feet, and they're light-weight to boot. These are a great value at their low price, especially if they last a long time. Would happily consider giving these as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, slightly on small side
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable. They are ever so slightly on the small side for me, not a big deal really once i got used to them. The back is open so it's not like your foot is getting squeezed. They do have soles so they don't walk totally silently, nothing wrong with that for me just depends if you care or not.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary J White

customer_reviews.title: bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Immediately knew they were too large. looked good but I returned them immediately without using. also the description and review(s) said quiet on hardwood floor--the hard sole clicked like my other name brand memory foam sandals--so not quiet.
customer_reviews.author: "Cabernet"

customer_reviews.title: Husband liked them for about three months
customer_reviews.text: Husband liked them for about three months, but I had to replace them because they quickly lost traction and he found himself slipping across the floor at unexpected moments. But he said they were comfortable the whole time. We have tile, if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee nichole lopez

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: I've always wondered why people just won't make a durable product of comfortable but inexpensive materials. These slipppers are perfect. They're still new so I don't know whether they will come to smell with continued use, but so far so great. Very comfortable, soft and fuzzy but durable enough for outside. The inner cushion is as-advertised, and there isn't some seam stitch somewhere in the shoe stabbing me. I'm looking them over for where I would predict they would start to come apart, but I can't see it, yet. I will have long gotten my money's worth before they do.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Don't last very long. Err on a size down if you're in between sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I wear men 8.5 and 7-8 were a good fit. The slippers are looser fitting and will stretch from use. They are very comfy and feel like standing on foam. But they don't last very long before the foam is all squished and there's no fluff left. This was from light use (average use of hour per day for a few months).
customer_reviews.author: John Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great winter slippers, run a bit small
customer_reviews.text: These run a bit small. Get a half to full size bigger than what you usually get. In case you want to wear socks. BUT they are great. Super plush and comfortable. Grips on bottom aren't the best and might slide a BIT if you're hustling around the house on wood floors.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Great product - They are extremely comfortable and just the right amount of warmth - They seem to have a therapeutic effect as well, my back pain seems to subside when I wear them - They are crafted well and it appears they will last awhile - The sole is not a rubber slip proof sole but it is sturdy and does assist in preventing slips - They also "look" like a much more expensive alternative ---- I would recommend these 100%
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: the foam was very comfortable, but now I am essentially walking on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these slippers for about 9 months and the memory foam cushioning is already flat. When new, the foam was very comfortable, but now I am essentially walking on the rubber sole. I am not a heavy person, nor do I wear them excessively. With all the man-made materials, these slippers had an odor for several days. For the price, these are decent slippers. However, comfort wise, my 10+ year old Eddie Bauer slippers (with natural materials) held up better than these.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: If I could do it over again, I would have bought a different brand.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 12 and initially ordered the 11-12. The way they make the heel part it was too small. I then ordered the 13-14 and these kind of fall off. They're warm and OK for inside the house. The cushion is probably too much and makes them feel a little wobbly walking up stairs. My biggest complaint is the heel part. Either this slipper should not have one or it should be a 1/2" higher. Kind of frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: m7

customer_reviews.title: OMG
customer_reviews.text: OMG, these are like walking on a cloud. Super soft and luxurious fitted. I would like the "heel" a little higher to help keep them on my feets. But they are slip-ons and that's what I wanted. I don't regularity go sprinting, running, or moving faster than a Sloth in my slippers. But sometimes you have to hoof it up the hill to the porta-john, and it's nice to have warm feets.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O.

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyment at a later date
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I have not been able to enjoy these slippers to their fullest extent because I am currently experiencing edema in my feet. This would account for the slippers feeling a little too small. Hopefully I will enjoy them once the edema is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: incredibly comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: incredibly comfortable and warm! exactly what I was looking for to walk around the house when it gets cold. The size fit perfectly even though some previous reviews said the shoes ran small and to order a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Awesome slippers.
customer_reviews.text: I love these cushy slippers. They are super comfortable and I love wearing them around the apartment. They're a bit large for even my feel but that's okay for slippers. I would highly recommend especially for the price as they're just as good as expensive memory foam slippers for a fraction of the price. I do not wear these outside even though I think they can be worn in that way.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Azhar

customer_reviews.title: nothing like the photo
customer_reviews.text: These slippers looked pporly made. One was so deformed the edges were flopping down and did not fit snug around the foot. Looked like they were run over by a car. Returned to exchange for a different pair.
customer_reviews.author: u2u4ea

customer_reviews.title: low heel is the worst part for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like the comfy memory foam insole. I have never been a fan of the low heel. After a few days of breaking in this low heal has become more manageable for me. I have been really tough on my slippers go through pairs every few months. I hope these last longer. They seem to be of pretty good quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: Cee DeLoy

customer_reviews.title: Great cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I'm a marathon runner and occasionally have pain in my midfoot from all of the impact, as I'm a road runner and put in 50mpw. These have really helped for walking around the house, giving me extra padding so that my feet get a break. My one gripe is that I wish there was more of a back to the slippers, they slide off as I'm walking up stairs...
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great For The Lazy, Sick, or Just Skipping Work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after knee surgery and realized that my old slippers were too gross to wear to doctor's appointments. They are clean, oh so comfy, and warm if you are stuck in a drafty apartment with a case of diphtheria.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Salniker

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, good sole, good for any occasion around the house.
customer_reviews.text: For those with cold feet all the time, these are best. For those with nerve issues associated with some drug you are taking, get these. They have a good sole that you can take outside (not to the store or anything please). They are washable and really keep my feet warm. I've never had the need for something like this but that time has past and something warm but light and washable is this product. Well done all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These were a little snug when I put them on but, as per the instructions, after a couple hours it felt like a custom fit! By far the best slippers I have ever owned and, being an ol feeb, that's a lot of slippers. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Melt

customer_reviews.title: Cozy
customer_reviews.text: God looks, nice and cushy, and warm... sizing may run small as I'm a 10-10.5 and the mediums were just right ..
customer_reviews.author: Gordon K

customer_reviews.title: These slippers are also so very warm and comfortable and will have to buy another pair because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I have big feet, 14 inches to be exact. I have trouble finding slippers that fit properly unless I purchase from an expensive tall man's store. These slippers do not slide off of my feet when walking up and down stairs which was the main criteria for buying slippers.These slippers are also so very warm and comfortable and will have to buy another pair because I am in them all day. (Retired). I hope they will not discontinue making these. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Mikee

customer_reviews.title: Love these slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair -- the first lasted about 2 years, which is pretty good seeing as I wear them every minute I spend in my house. I also have worn them outside for short sprints. The slippers are very comfy and the faux wool keeps my feet warm (but not too warm -- these are fine on my feet throughout the summer). It is just a nice soft pillow around my feet. The title says it all!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: Great slipper. I use them year round around the house and to walk outside to the mailbox. They fit well. I did go up one size because I'd rather my slippers to be a little loose versus too tight. They're also very warm if you're a person who has cold feet.
customer_reviews.author: AlbaCrush

customer_reviews.title: Nice slippers. Order the same size shoe you wear
customer_reviews.text: Do not listen to the other reviews... I wear a 11.5 and I ordered 1 size bigger, they are big I ordered another pair with the size that I actually wear and those first perfectly. Order the size you wear they do NOT run small. They are nice slippers. I will definitely order another pair. I just wish I could exchange the big one's for the correct size except I wore them for about a week
customer_reviews.author: William Killman

customer_reviews.title: WAY too small
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a size 9 shoe and never had any problems with footwear fitting him. Got these for Christmas and they were TOOOOOO small for this feet. Ended up giving them to my son instead.
customer_reviews.author: ucon4483

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Hard as a rock! I am pregnant and expected this to be heaven sent as memory foam can be. Put these on and my feet immediately sunk to the floor!
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Smyrski

customer_reviews.title: The slipper actual size does not match the marked or advertised size.
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 10EE so I ordered the size 11-12 which usually fits. I could not fit my foot into the slipper. My heel stuck out about an inch. Not sure whose size chart is being used, but it is not anything close to being correct. I sent them back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: TechUser

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but pay attention to sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers, although they do seem to run a bit large. I read other reviews that said this, but they seemed to explain that it was okay because you wear socks with them. Well, unless you wear super thick socks...like inches thick socks... no. Even with my heavy wool socks I put on during cold snaps, these are a little large. Not a deal breaker, just something of note.
customer_reviews.author: R. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Hope your patient
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than what they advertised on sizes and i hope your patient because shipping takes a long long time. When you finally get the product their very comfortable and a size bigger than they advertised but all in all good slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Quaranta

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I paid attention to what other reviews were saying and ordered one size up for my husband. The reason I said fit as expected was for that reason. Sorry if this is confusing, but I think the reason for the one size up is because of the little lip on the back of the slipper. If I had gone with the smaller size, he probably would be walking on the back of the slipper instead of his foot fitting within the slipper. He really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: freakmeister

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy and soft
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these out of guilt. My dogs chewed the back of my favorite slippers and when I went to buy another pair they were all sold out. I bought these and put them on and loved them. Then my wife walked in the room with a Valentines Day gift for me. She had bought a new pair of my old slippers. I had to return these. I'm going to keep this order saved so when I need a new pair next year I'll get these again.
customer_reviews.author: Madtown

customer_reviews.title: Size was right first time, warm and padded.
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, keep your feet warm, don't slip off, and sole waterproof enough you can wear outside when concrete is wet (not ground). Only complaint they are little noisy on hardwood, cats don't like when I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: digger

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure he thinks they are shoes since he wears ...
customer_reviews.text: These have been attached to my kid's feet almost exclusively since the day they arrived. Pretty sure he thinks they are shoes since he wears them everywhere. Recently, he wore them with a button-down shirt, aviator glasses and jeans to go visit his former teachers at his alma mater, a posh private school. He marches to the beat of his own drummer...in these slippers, it seems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit a big foot well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who has large instep and a high volume foot. I ordered up a size and they fit great. He loves them. I had to give the expensive Sorrels to our son who has an average size foot. Everyone was happy and you can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisM

customer_reviews.title: MEH?  I am not impressed.  These are not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Not outdoor worthy... except to maybe take out the trash. As long as that a few steps on concrete away. Seriously cheap with no feeling of memory foam in them at all. Not at all what I expected from reading the description.
customer_reviews.author: HardcoreZen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my Fiance and he loves them! He blissfully said they were like walking on sunshine.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rosburg

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but too warm for me
customer_reviews.text: The fit was okay and they were comfortable enough walking around the house, I just found them to be way too warm on my feet so I returned them. For those that don't like your feet to get too hot, I suggest avoiding these.
customer_reviews.author: Mark H.

customer_reviews.title: Great review!
customer_reviews.text: My wife bought these slippers for me because I developed neuropathy in my hands and feet after several cycles of chemo. Its become quite difficult for me to walk around without feeling pain in my feet. The memory foam in these shoes is fantastic. I feel so much better when I walk around; i can feel the difference. We were so pleased with the reviews of this product and thought we should try them out. I'm so glad we did.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McClung

product_meta.title: Men's Slippers Fuzzy House Shoes Memory Foam Slip On Clog Plush Wool Fleece Indoor Outdoor
feature_bullets: SIZING TIP - You may feel your new slippers tight at first,this is because we have made the memory foam insole thicker. It takes you a days to fit in the slippers, and you will feel more comfortable after the slippers stretching to your size.

MULTI-LAYER CUSHIONED - The completely improved insole is constructed with 3 layers of memory foam and sponge to provide superior comfortability. The fleece collar with its exquisitely stitched upper wraps your feet well and naturally molds to your feet with each step.

ULTIMATE COMFORT - Soft fuzzy sherpa lining offer next-to-skin comfort to keep you warm and cozy in all seasons especially cold autumn and winter. Easy slip on design makes the shoes so fashion , breathable and convenient.

VERSATILE STYLE: - They are not just a great choice for indoors home slippers. The anti-slip TPR hard sole prevents water and dampness from absorbing into these slippers and provides you with all the flexibility and support you need, making you walk steadily outdoors
